title: LoreOne, world’s first 3D printed road shoes, LORE teases most custom cycling shoes ever!
content:
Technology upstart LORE has figured out how to make custom cycling shoes even more custom, by 3D-printing the upcoming LoreOne carbon road shoe to perfectly fit your foot. While we only really have a tease of their “world’s first” 3D printed cycling shoe, there’s plenty of interesting tech to peel back, with the unmatched fit […]

The post LoreOne, world’s first 3D printed road shoes, LORE teases most custom cycling shoes ever! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
